document_data.mainbody:
The Brain Brokerage was located on the edge of the southwestern-most section of the Ring Caverns of Oryndoll. The mind flayer merchants of the consortium often specialized in acquiring rare brains from willing merchants of other races.
It was common for the brain brokerage to organize caravans to other Underdark cities with the purpose of getting access to rare brains. Caravans traveled to Guallidurth, Ooltul, Sloopdilmonpolop, Sshamath, and Zokir.
